A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Fresh and new.
(Possible SPOILERS to come)

I left the theater with a new set of feelings that never got from other episodes. You expect it to be dark because it is the middle episode\, but yet it is so full of hope. You expect it to be brutal to the good guys and it actually goes beyond what you expect. It introduces new aspects of the Force and develops characters on the level of Empire Strikes back and beyond!
